医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明母亲不良的童年经历可能会融入生物学研究人员通过评估母亲的童年创伤经历以及怀孕母亲及其新生后代的表观遗传时钟，研究了生活经历的生物嵌入在代际之间的转移。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-suggests-maternal-adverse-childhood-experiences-may-become-biologically-embedded.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-suggests-maternal-adverse-childhood-experiences-may-become-biologically-embedded.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe292ad6-1c82-4a4d-b713-56b0ccd75183 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 12:02:00 -0400 Study suggests maternal adverse childhood experiences may become biologically embedded
梅奥诊所率先使用脉冲场消融治疗心房颤动梅奥诊所心律失常诊所的心脏病专家正在使用一种新的创新能源来安全、成功地治疗一种常见类型的心律失常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Mayo-Clinic-pioneers-use-of-pulsed-field-ablation-to-treat-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Mayo-Clinic-pioneers-use-of-pulsed-field-ablation-to-treat-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35649cf4-2a2d-492a-9f8c-96794c32b04d Tue, 13 Aug 2024 10:53:20 -0400 Mayo Clinic pioneers use of pulsed field ablation to treat atrial fibrillation
较高的血红素铁摄入量与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关血红素铁（存在于红肉和其他动物产品中）的摄入量较高，与主要存在于植物性食品中的非血红素铁相反，与患 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 的较高风险相关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Higher-heme-iron-intake-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Higher-heme-iron-intake-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05d23d5b-3536-4319-9c35-8cb397c9ffd9 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 10:49:10 -0400 Higher heme iron intake linked to increased risk of type 2 diabetes
研究揭示小清蛋白神经元在睡眠剥夺后深度反弹睡眠中的作用Hiroki R. Ueda 教授（RIKEN 功能生物学中心，兼任团队负责人）、Kazuhiro Kon 博士（研究时，目前是约翰·霍普金斯大学的博士后研究员）和他们在医学研究生院的同事东京等人阐明了在长时间清醒后发生的长时间深度睡眠（反弹睡眠）中，正确调节表达小清蛋白（PV）的神经元（大脑皮层中的主要抑制性神经元）的活动的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-role-of-parvalbumin-neurons-in-deep-rebound-sleep-after-sleep-deprivation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-role-of-parvalbumin-neurons-in-deep-rebound-sleep-after-sleep-deprivation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6f337fa-9887-495b-9f61-6c609575e26a Tue, 13 Aug 2024 10:29:26 -0400 Study reveals role of parvalbumin neurons in deep rebound sleep after sleep deprivation
创新的人工智能系统利用舌头颜色识别多种健康状况计算机算法通过分析人类舌头的颜色来预测不同疾病的准确率达到 98%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Innovative-AI-system-uses-tongue-color-to-identify-multiple-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Innovative-AI-system-uses-tongue-color-to-identify-multiple-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1b29a9d-d6b6-4050-bc44-7d6971583ed6 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 10:20:29 -0400 Innovative AI system uses tongue color to identify multiple health conditions
遗传学中的生成人工智能：有效但需要监控一致性Samuel (Sandy) Aronson，ALM，MA，麻省总医院 Brigham 个性化医疗 IT 和 AI 解决方案执行总监，临床转型加速器 IT 和 AI 解决方案高级总监，是《NEJM AI》上发表的一篇论文的通讯作者：研究生成人工智能是否有望改善临床基因检测中变异的科学文献审查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Generative-AI-in-genics-Effective-but-needs-monitoring-for-consistency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Generative-AI-in-genics-Effective-but-needs-monitoring-for-consistency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f314f07-90de-4553-9071-1ec660094743 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 10:07:43 -0400 Generative AI in genetics: Effective but needs monitoring for consistency
利用先进的机器学习及早发现心血管疾病如何在症状出现之前发现心血管系统疾病？格拉茨理工大学（TU Graz）的研究人员找到了一种在早期阶段追踪它们的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Early-detection-of-cardioangio-diseases-using-advanced-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Early-detection-of-cardioangio-diseases-using-advanced-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1c92f7-47d5-4b6d-989b-0aa7ee5892b0 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 07:06:43 -0400 Early detection of cardiovascular diseases using advanced machine learning
加州法案将要求州政府对医疗保健领域的私募股权交易进行审查加州立法机关正在审议一项加强对医疗保健私募股权投资监管的法案，该法案得到了消费者权益倡导者、工会和加州医学协会的热情支持，但也遭到了担心失去潜在资金来源的医院的猛烈抨击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/California-bill-would-require-state-review-of-private-equity-deals-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/California-bill-would-require-state-review-of-private-equity-deals-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d093300-9c49-4053-8574-56b7178dde83 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 06:38:01 -0400 California bill would require state review of private equity deals in health care
新研究强调社会经济因素对自闭症青少年多动症的影响儿童邻里特征与注意力缺陷/多动障碍（ADHD）症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-study-highlights-impact-of-socioeconomic-factors-on-ADHD-in-autistic-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-study-highlights-impact-of-socioeconomic-factors-on-ADHD-in-autistic-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500e1909-26f7-4ce6-9d67-881bddeadd73 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 04:27:00 -0400 New study highlights impact of socioeconomic factors on ADHD in autistic youth
研究发现，优先考虑老年人接种 COVID-19 加强剂可产生最佳公共卫生结果在不同的社会经济环境中，优先考虑老年人接种 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种是否始终能带来最佳的公共卫生结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Prioritizing-older-individuals-for-COVID-19-boosters-yields-best-public-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Prioritizing-older-individuals-for-COVID-19-boosters-yields-best-public-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a10e34a-d439-485f-a901-ff3440d78631 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 03:56:00 -0400 Prioritizing older individuals for COVID-19 boosters yields best public health outcomes, study finds
